resources.string:
Hello my name is Janet Mutua 

 I am a mobile developer based in Kenya. 
 I love eating fish and chicken. 
 My favorite passtime is seeking out adventures. 

 I have a house and live with my cat Reede. 
 I am working on my ANdroid-Kotlin skills , 
 And i hope that by mid-year or end year I will have: 

 Mastered Android, Kotlin 
 and read 20 books on ANdroid and Kotlin. 
 I am still n my first book. Bye!
